item.title: Help me
item.dc:creator: @shockys shockys
item.description:
@shockys wrote:

here; i’ll give you a copy & paste.
unjail:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“unjail”) && playerRights >= 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(7);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

if (otherPIndex != -1) {
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
p.action = 0;
sM(“You have Unjailed “+p.playerName+”!”);
} else { [/code]

item.title: Help me
item.dc:creator: @blacksabath blacksabath
item.description:
@blacksabath wrote:

does anybody know the commands to put in the client.java folder for unban unipban and unjail it should look like this something like that.
if (command.startsWith(“kick”) && playerRights > 1) {
client noob = null;

            for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++){
		if(server.playerHandler.players[i] != null){
			if(command.substring(5).equalsIgnoreCase(server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName)){
				noob = (client)server.playerHandler.players[i];
				noob.disconnected = true;
				noob.logoutButton = true;

yell(" “+playerName+” has Kicked “+noob.playerName+” ");
}
}
}
}
